pages.text: This ship may need some rebalancing, but it's main idea is to make it harder to find your ships. But once this ship is destroyed, you're in trouble..

$(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/seaworthy)Seaworthy/$ with 100 extra tiles. Anytime one of your ships is hit, reveal 3 of your empty tiles. When destroyed, reveal 80 empty tiles if possible. If the enemy falls below 5 HP and this ship is alive, reveal the ship.
pages.title: Passive Ability
